channel.title: Music and Sound Help
channel.description:
I've been messing around with the Music in silabs client, and was wondering how to enable it in standard 317 clients. Also, there are a HUGE number of 'blank' music IDs, and I was wondering if these were somehow not included in Silabs client, or there simply empty. This is questionable because I can't seem to find a lot of the music that should be there, such as the music that plays near the chicken coop in real RuneScape. I have however found and added some wilderness and the Death music to my server. So basicly I'm asking why are there so many empty slots? And also if anyone has found the Packet ID for sound effects and if they are also 'broken' in the normal 317 release.
Heres the list I have of Valid music so far: (Blank means I havent found out what it is, and ? means its a 'short music', ones that last only a few seconds, such as leveling up) [code] 24 34 - edge of wildy 48 - wildy 49 - fally farms started at 50 50 60 61 62 - tutorial island 64 72 - 73 76 - lumby 77 - 86 - 87 - ice path? 92 93 - near lumber place for cat quest 96 - wildy 98 - edge 104 - path?/lumby 105 106 108 111 113 116 - varrock mining area? 118 - zanaris?? 120 123 - al karid mining! 125 - varrock 126 133 140 141 - barb ville 144 - scapecave! 145 147 - blank? 151 156 - something spooky? 157 - some path/near varrock? 160 - wildy 169 172 - loud 0.0 175 - some city/path 177 179 - wildy somewhere 180 - path or something 181 - ZANARIS! =D 182 - 194 - levelup 195 - levelup 196 - levelup 197 - levelup 198 - levelup 199 - levelup 200 - levelup 201 - levelup 202 - levelup 203 - DEATH 204 - 205 - levelup 206 - levelup 207 - levelup 208 - levelup 209 - levelup 210 - levelup 211 - levelup 212 - levelup 213 - levelup fishing 214 - levelup 215 - levelup 216 - levelup 217 - levelup 218 - levelup 219 - levelup 220 - levelup 221 - levelup 222 - levelup 223 - levelup 224 - levelup 225 - ship carrying 226 - levelup 227 - levelup 228 - levelup 229 - levelup 230 - levelup 231 - levelup 232 - levelup 233 - ? 234 - ? 235 - levelup 236 - levelup 237 - levelup 238 - levelup 239 - levelup 240 - levelup 249 - levelup 250 - ? 272 - ? 273 - ? 274 - ? 275 - ? 276 - ? skipped to 400 404 - ?
skipped to 500 500 - 502 - 503 - 507 - 512 - ? 513 - ? 514 - 516 - 518 - ? 521 - 522 - 526 - 527 - 531 - jaws? 536 - 539 - ? 540 - ? 549 - ? 550 - 551 - 552 - Construction - enter a house! 553 - ?
[/code]
Also, DO NOT LEECH, and PLEASE post, or I will remove the list. So far my server is the only server I know of to have music capability.
